citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 am on
November 24, 2025. The inspector phoned the licensee upon arrival at the facility, and the licensee said he could come
when finished with what he was doing. The inspector said he could wait up to an hour. The licensee did arrive at the
facility in about 15 minutes, but said he had an important meeting in 10 minutes and couldn't stay long enough to
complete a full inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious
violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 am on 
November 24, 2025. The inspector phoned the licensee upon arrival at the facility, and the licensee said he could come 
when finished with what he was doing. The inspector said he could wait up to an hour. The licensee did arrive at the 
facility in about 15 minutes, but said he had an important meeting in 10 minutes and couldn't stay long enough to 
complete a full inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious 
violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
